name: Space Shooter: Classic
description:
Hey there, thanks for visiting in. Welcome to Space Shooter : Classic download page.

Play the 2D Space Shooter game now for free, which contain 9 levels along with an endless mode! We hope you would like it, also, feel free to send us your feedbacks, queries or complaints in the comments section below.

FEATURES:

  • 9 levels (each having a boss ship to fight at the end) with endless mode
  • 3 ships (including the bonus ship) available to play (which unlock later as you play through levels)
  • A bonus ship available (which has extreme firepower and defense and unlocks when you complete all levels)

You may need to run the game as an administrator to avoid crashes if your installation directory requires administrator access (the default installation directory requires!)!

Thanks for Playing :)

CREDITS :

Game Developed by : 889 Games, Vaibhav Kumar (vaibhavkr @itch.io)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Endless Mode Idea by : Anish Kumar
